name: Build It
description:
Build It is a revolutionary game, it can be contained in the "Real Life" category which includes: Roleplay, Survival, Building, and Adventures.
The game is about progression and choosing paths, at the start you will gather resources by hand and sell them in the market. Then you can move to mining with a pickaxe. With the money you earn you will be able you buy a land inside a city and build yourself a house, in addition, you can build many types of vehicles that will fit your need.
After you settle in a city you will be able to join a job in the city and get paid for it. You'll also be able build a shop in a special lands inside the city and sell your goods and vehicles there.
